title: Apply user-provided backgrounds for Pages 1–3 and install persistent looping background music

requirements.summary: Replace Page 1–3 background images by overwriting the expected static asset filenames in frontend/public/assets/generated/ without changing existing contain/letterbox + overlay rendering behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: When visiting route / (Page 1), the background image displayed is the one from InsMix_20260209_211147926.jpg, shown in contain/letterbox mode (not cropped) with the existing black overlay.
When navigating to /proposal (Page 2), the background image displayed is the floral dress collage (InsMix_20260209_231320300.jpg) in contain/letterbox mode with the existing black overlay.
When navigating to /final (Page 3), the background image displayed is InsMix_20260209_231554807.jpg in contain/letterbox mode with the existing black overlay.
No code changes are required to swap these three backgrounds in the future beyond replacing the three files at frontend/public/assets/generated/ with the exact same filenames.

requirements.summary: Install user-provided MP3 as the hidden looping background music at the expected static filename so autoplay is attempted with interaction fallback and playback persists across route navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: On initial site visit, the app attempts to start playing background music immediately; if the browser blocks autoplay, the first user interaction (click/tap) starts playback.
The background music loops continuously and has no visible audio player controls.
Music continues playing while navigating from Page 1 -> Page 2 -> Page 3 without restarting due to route changes.
Replacing frontend/public/assets/generated/background-music.mp3 with a different MP3 changes the music without any code changes.

file_operations.description: Add the user-uploaded MP3 (Soch_Na_Sake_FULL_VIDEO_SONG_AIRLIFT_Akshay_Kumar,_Nimrat_Kaur_Arijit_Singh,_Tulsi_Kumar_128k.mp3) to this exact path/filename so the existing background-audio logic can load it without code changes.
